Article.ArticleTitle: No place to run: Plants have evolved a dazzling array of chemical defences and regulatory networks that matches the mammalian immune system for complexity.

AbstractText: Plants have evolved an astounding armory of chemical defenses and communication to fend of pests and predators. Understanding this complex network would benefit architecture and biotechnology. [Image: see text]
